Package main.java.neat.core

Class Node

java.lang.Object
main.java.neat.core.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a node in a neural network genome within the NEAT algorithm. Handles activation, aggregation, and connection management for neural network operations.

Key responsibilities:

  • Maintain node type (input/hidden/output) and network layer position.
  • Store and mutate bias/response values.
  • Manage input/output connections.
  • Perform neural activation calculations.
See Also:
